page.title: 13Computers
page.content:
My school has about thirty computers, they are mainly BBC Computers. We do not use these much, but, in the upper school we will have computer lessons each week.
My computer at home is a Sinclair ZX Spectrum, which has 48K of memory. It is made by a British company, but most computers are made in America or Japan. My friends have Sinclair or Commodore Computers, the Commodore has 64K of memory and is American. These computers are quite cheap and there are many games which you can play on these computers, my favourite is "Football Manager", where you are in charge of a league soccer team. My friends and I spend a lot of time playing computer games.
